questions:
What is the photo mainly about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Transportation and vehicles
D) Art and culture

Where was the photo taken?
A) In a city park
B) At the beach
C) In a bus depot
D) Inside a museum

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A parking area for buses
D) A family gathering

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A large tree
B) A group of buses
C) A building
D) A playground

What is in the background of the photo?
A) The ocean
B) A mountain range
C) Trees and greenery
D) A busy street

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A large crowd of people
B) A grassy area and a fence
C) A row of houses
D) A river

How many buses are visible in the photo?
A) Three
B) Five
C) Seven
D) Nine

What color are the buses in the photo?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Yellow
D) Green

What type of building is visible in the photo?
A) A residential house
B) A school
C) A warehouse or garage
D) A shopping mall

What is the condition of the sky in the photo?
A) Cloudy
B) Rainy
C) Clear and blue
D) Overcast

What is the predominant color in the photo?
A) Green and yellow
B) Yellow
C) Blue
D) Red

Are there any people visible in the photo?
A) Yes
B) No

What is the primary material of the building in the photo?
A) Wood
B) Brick
C) Metal
D) Glass

What is the purpose of the area depicted in the photo?
A) Recreational
B) Residential
C) Commercial
D) Transportation

What is the most prominent feature of the photo?
A) The trees
B) The building
C) The buses
D) The fence

What is the color of the roof of the building in the photo?
A) Red
B) White
C) Green
D) Gray

What is the condition of the grass in the foreground?
A) Lush and green
B) Dry and brown
C) Covered in snow
D) Overgrown

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) The natural scenery
B) The architectural design
C) The parked buses
D) The people

What is the perspective of the photo?
A) Aerial view
B) Ground level
C) Underwater
D) Eye level

What is the color of the fence in the photo?
A) Black
B) White
C) Silver
D) Green

How many buses are directly facing the camera?
A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) None

What kind of vegetation is visible in the background?
A) Flowers
B) Shrubs
C) Trees
D) Grass

What is the orientation of the buses in the photo?
A) Randomly arranged
B) Neatly aligned
C) Scattered
D) In a circular formation

What is the condition of the road in the foreground?  
A) Paved  
B) Gravel  
C) Dirt  
D) Asphalt

What is the architectural style of the building in the photo?
A) Modern
B) Traditional
C) Industrial
D) Colonial

What is the relationship between the buses and the building?
A) The buses are parked in front of the building
B) The buses are inside the building
C) The buses are being loaded into the building
D) The buses are surrounding the building

What is the visual style of the photo?
A) Black and white
B) Sepia
C) Color
D) Infrared

What is the primary visual element in the photo?
A) The sky
B) The building
C) The buses
D) The grass

What color are the school buses?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Yellow
D) Green

What is the condition of the weather in the photo?
A) Rainy
B) Snowy
